Title: Do away with superstition, transform social traditions, inspire the enthusiasm of the people!
Designer: Central Academy of Industrial Art and Design (中央工艺美术学院)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The tractor driver scares off a traditional scholar, studying an ancient tome entitled "Appreciate the old", as well as a professor infatuated with Western knowledge, carrying a book with the title "Appreciate the West".
